categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Rubatin was a Human male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War and the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3640 BBY, Rubatin, fought alongside Masters Joce and Injaye during the battle on the planet Corellia. When they encountered the Emperor's Wrath, Rubatin and the Jedi fought against the Sith Lord, but were all defeated.
If the Wrath chooses to expose one of them as a Sith, they could choose to spare Rubatin and Joce for light side points or kill them for dark side points.
